00029 /* Creation flags. */
00030 #define T_FPU     XNFPU
00031 #define T_SUSP    XNSUSP
00032 /* <!> High bits must not conflict with XNFPU|XNSHADOW|XNSHIELD|XNSUSP. */
00033 #define T_CPU(cpu) (1 << (24 + (cpu & 7))) /* Up to 8 cpus [0-7] */
00034 #define T_CPUMASK  0xff000000
00035 
00036 /* Status/mode flags. */
00037 #define T_BLOCKED XNPEND
00038 #define T_DELAYED XNDELAY
00039 #define T_READY   XNREADY
00040 #define T_DORMANT XNDORMANT
00041 #define T_STARTED XNSTARTED
00042 #define T_BOOST   XNBOOST
00043 #define T_LOCK    XNLOCK
00044 #define T_RRB     XNRRB
00045 #define T_NOSIG   XNASDI
00046 #define T_SHIELD  XNSHIELD

00051 #define T_HOOK_DELETE XNHOOK_THREAD_DELETE
00052 #define T_DESC(cookie) thread2rtask(cookie)

00055 #define T_LOPRIO  FUSION_LOW_PRIO
00056 #define T_HIPRIO  FUSION_HIGH_PRIO

00086 typedef struct rt_task {
00087 
00088     unsigned magic;   /* !< Magic code - must be first */
00089

00091

00094 
00095     xntimer_t timer;
00096 
00097     xnthread_t thread_base;
00098

00100 
00101     int suspend_depth;
00102 
00103     int overrun;
00104 
00105     xnarch_cpumask_t affinity;
00106 
00107     union { /* Saved args for current synch. wait operation. */
00108

00110             int mode;
00111             unsigned long mask;
00112         } event;

00114         struct rt_queue_msg *qmsg;

00122             const char *key;
00123         } registry;

00127 } RT_TASK;

00129 static inline RT_TASK *thread2rtask (xnthread_t *t)
00130 {
00131     return t ? ((RT_TASK *)(((char *)(t)) - (int)(&((RT_TASK *)0)->thread_base))) : NULL;
00132 }
